15:21 <gdelhumeau> sdumitriu: hi  
15:21 <gdelhumeau> Do you have some opinion on https://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-13861?focusedCommentId=93378&page=com.atlassian.jira.plugin.system.issuetabpanels:comment-tabpanel#comment-93378 ?  
15:47 <Enygma`1> has joined #xwiki  
15:51 <Enygma`> has quit  
17:37 <msmeria> has quit  
18:10 <gdelhumeau> mflorea: this commit might interest you :)  
18:11 <vmassol> gdelhumeau: you'll merge this in 8.4.x right?  
18:11 <gdelhumeau> probably  
18:11 <gdelhumeau> I'll update the @since tag at that time :)  
18:11 <vmassol> (it's in the 8.4 roadmap)  
18:11 <vmassol> k  
18:12 <gdelhumeau> yes but I want to cherry-pick it when it's ready (possibly in 8.4.2)  
18:12 <vmassol> it's not ready?  
18:12 <gdelhumeau> ready = when other committers will agree on the solution I made :)  
18:13 <vmassol> ok, then 8.4.1 should be our target as much as possible  
18:13 <vmassol> it's dangerous?  
18:13 <vmassol> reading… :)  
18:14 <vmassol> you're cheating a bit with internal between modules ;)  
18:14 <vmassol> you should probably use @Unstable instead and move it out of internal. Actually the location might not be the correct one  
18:15 <vmassol> I'll comment  
18:16 <gdelhumeau> I have been told that we can reuse internal between modules as soon as it is on platform  
18:17 <vmassol> well if you have a need then the need exists :)  
18:17 <gdelhumeau> the Configuration interface could be exposed actually  
18:17 <vmassol> imagine also that we move the module to contrib for ex  
18:17 <vmassol> but in this case check my comment  
18:18 <vmassol> I think you put it in the wrong class  
18:18 <gdelhumeau> you see, it's not ready :p  
18:18 <vmassol> hehe but that's easy to fix  
18:18 <gdelhumeau> indeed
